root.name: Zombies, Run!
root.description: Zombies, Run is an audio based video games for smart phones. The game takes place during a zombie apocalypse and you play the roll of a supply runner working for a zombie proof base. Missions are ideally meant to be played while a player is out jogging, the game has a narrator who will describe the environment to you. At pre-determined points zombies will run after you and the only way to escape them is to run at a faster speed.The goal of each run is to gather vital supplies for your base and if you are attacked by Zombies you loose picked up items. Once each run is over there is a resource management section where you devy out supplies as needed.
